SEARCH
Package com.indus.training.persist.dao

Interface IOrderDao

All Known Implementing Classes:
OrderDaoImpl
public interface IOrderDao
Interface for managing Order data access operations. Provides methods to insert, fetch, delete, and update Order records.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Boolean
    deleteOrder(Integer orderId)
    Deletes a order record from the database based on the order ID.
    Order
    fetchOrder(Integer orderId)
    Fetches a order record from the database based on the order ID.
    Boolean
    insertOrder(Order order)
    Inserts a Order object into the database.
    Boolean
    updateOrderById(Integer orderId, Order updatedOrder)
    Updates the order in the database.
    Boolean
    updateTotalAmountOfOrder(Order order, Double updatedTotalAmount)
    Updates the total amount order in the database.

  • Method Details

    • insertOrder

      Boolean insertOrder(Order order) throws OrderDaoException
      Inserts a Order object into the database.
      Parameters:
      order - the Order object to insert
      Returns:
      true if the order was inserted successfully, false otherwise
      Throws:
      OrderDaoException - if an error occurs during the insertion process

    • fetchOrder

      Order fetchOrder(Integer orderId) throws OrderDaoException
      Fetches a order record from the database based on the order ID.
      Parameters:
      orderId - the ID of the order to fetch
      Returns:
      the Order object corresponding to the given order ID, or null if not found
      Throws:
      OrderDaoException - if an error occurs during the fetch operation

    • deleteOrder

      Boolean deleteOrder(Integer orderId) throws OrderDaoException
      Deletes a order record from the database based on the order ID.
      Parameters:
      orderId - the ID of the order to delete
      Returns:
      true if the order was deleted successfully, false otherwise
      Throws:
      OrderDaoException - if an error occurs during the deletion process

    • updateOrderById

      Boolean updateOrderById(Integer orderId, Order updatedOrder) throws OrderDaoException
      Updates the order in the database.
      Parameters:
      orderId - the ID of the order to be updated
      updatedOrder - the updated order object
      Returns:
      true if the order was updated successfully, false otherwise
      Throws:
      OrderDaoException - if an error occurs during the update process

    • updateTotalAmountOfOrder

      Boolean updateTotalAmountOfOrder(Order order, Double updatedTotalAmount) throws OrderDaoException
      Updates the total amount order in the database.
      Parameters:
      order - the order for which total amount need to be updated
      updatedTotalAmount - the amount with which it need to be updated
      Returns:
      true if updated successfully
      Throws:
      OrderDaoException - if an error occurs during the update process
